categories: Category:Battles of Rebel Alliance Operation: Quick Strike

nodes.text: The Battle of the Obran Cluster was a space battle between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. It took place on a small scale, with forces of RZ-1 A-wing interceptors and Alpha-class Xg-1 Star Wings, assisted by respective transport forces, engaging one another in the Obran Asteroid Cluster.

Although the Alliance High Command had intelligence suggesting that the Empire had lain a trap for them in the asteroid cluster, the Rebels chose to attempt to retrieve their warhead supplies from the remote cache regardless. Rebel A-wings dropped out of hyperspace and engaged the Beta-class ETR-3 escort transport Trap Door as it finished laying Type A mines around the supply cache in the asteroid cluster. The Imperial Assault Gunboats, moving in a two-pronged pincer formation, moved to intercept the Rebels and prevent the Heavy Lifters of Beetle Group from carrying off the supply containers. Planning for difficulty, it was arranged that if the battle tilted in favor of the Empire, T-65 X-wing starfighters of Green Squadron could enter the area to help Blue Squadron clear the Assault Gunboats and protect the Heavy Lifters. Whether this occurred is unknown.

As players can participate in the mission "Ambush of Rebel Supply Recovery from Obran Cluster" in the computer game Star Wars: X-Wing vs. TIE Fighter on either the Rebel or the Imperial side—both sides have conflicting mission objectives—and victory is not essential to access the next set of missions, the battle itself is considered canon but the canon outcome is unknown.
The ships listed in this article are those found in the battle Rebel Alliance Operation: Quick Strike, using the default craft assigned to the player.
